A Customer.Request: Hello! Can I please have a "Normal Burger" today?

A Customer.Preference: I don't like cheese, so, with no cheese please!

Captain Australia.Request: G'day mate! Can I get "Questionable Burger" please?

Captain Australia.Preference: I'm so hungry, please put an extra patty in my burger! Ta!

John Citizen.Request: Hi there. I'm a healthy person you know. So, can I have "Healthy Burger" please?

John Citizen.Preference: And, with no veggies please. Yes, you heard me right, no veggies!

Jane Citizen.Request: Hi... I'd like to have the "Healthy Burger" please.

Jane Citizen.Preference:
I don't want the chicken.
It reminds me of John...

Scott Morris.Request: Good day! A quick question, can I have the "Questionable Burger" please?

Scott Morris.Preference:
With extra two slices of cheese please.
I hope it is not cheesy. Hahaha!
*laughs at own attempt to be funny*

The Mighty Princess.Request: Oh, tell me dear citizen, can this Princess have the "Healthy Burger" please?

The Mighty Princess.Preference: Make it with extra one lettuce! I will reward you handsomely...

Donald T..Request: I'm a busy man. Give the "Questionable Burger". Thanks.

Donald T..Preference:
Oh, and I'll have it without lettuce!
No lettuce!!
*throws fist in the air*

Mickey M..Request: Hello... Hmm... I'm interested in trying the "Healthy Burger" please...

Mickey M..Preference: I love tomato, so can I have double the sauce please?

Unicorn.Request: Hiya! Can I have "Questionable Burger" please?

Unicorn.Preference:
Leave the tomato sauce out please.
It will ruin the colour balance of my rainbow.

A Robot.Request: Beep... Can I have the.. Beep... "Normal Burger" please?

A Robot.Preference: Beep... With triple... Beep... Patty please...
